00083     int RGBColorBasedEuclideanClustering::segment()
00084     {
00085         assert (this->inputPointCloud != 0);
00086         if( (inputPointCloud->getSize() > 0)  && ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[0].asColoredPoint3D() == 0) ) {
00087                 LOG(ERROR) << "Point clous does not seem to contain color data.";
00088             return 0;
00089         }else{
00090             extractClusters(this->inputPointCloud);
00091             return 1;
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095     void RGBColorBasedEuclideanClustering::extractClusters(brics_3d::PointCloud3D *inCloud)
00096     {
00097         this->extractedClusters.clear();
00098         brics_3d::PCLTypecaster pclTypecaster;
00099         pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr inputXYZ(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>());
00100         pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr inputXYZRGB(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
00101 
00102         pclTypecaster.convertToPCLDataType(inputXYZ, inCloud);
00103         pclTypecaster.convertToPCLDataType(inputXYZRGB, inCloud);
00104 
00105 
00106         // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
00107         pcl::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree(new pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::PointXYZ>);
00108         tree->setInputCloud(inputXYZ);
00109         //============================================================================================
00110         // Create a bool vector of processed point indices, and initialize it to false
00111         std::vector<bool> processed(inputXYZ->points.size(), false);
00112         std::vector<int> nn_indices;
00113         std::vector<float> nn_distances;
00114         // Process all points in the indices vector
00115         for(size_t i = 0;i < inputXYZ->points.size();++i){
00116             if(processed[i])
00117                 continue;
00118 
00119             std::vector<int> seed_queue;
00120             int sq_idx = 0;
00121             seed_queue.push_back(i);
00122             processed[i] = true;
00123             while(sq_idx < (int)(seed_queue.size()))
00124                 {
00125                         // Search for sq_idx
00126                         if (!tree->radiusSearch (seed_queue[sq_idx], this->toleranceEuclideanDistance, nn_indices, nn_distances))
00127                         {
00128                                 sq_idx++;
00129                                 continue;
00130                         }
00131 
00132                         for (size_t j = 1; j < nn_indices.size (); ++j)             // nn_indices[0] should be sq_idx
00133                         {
00134                                 if (processed[nn_indices[j]]) {
00135                                         continue;                            // Has this point been processed before ?
00136                                 } else {
00137                                         // Perform a simple Euclidean clustering
00138                                         float rgbVal24Bit = inputXYZRGB->points[i].rgb;
00139                                         uint32_t seed_rgb = *reinterpret_cast<int*> (&rgbVal24Bit);
00140 
00141                                         rgbVal24Bit = inputXYZRGB->points[nn_indices[j]].rgb;
00142                                         uint32_t current_rgb = *reinterpret_cast<int*> (&rgbVal24Bit);
00143 
00144                                         if(isSimilar(seed_rgb, current_rgb)){   //colors are similar
00145                                                 //                    ROS_INFO("Error = %f, RGB_1: [%d, %d, %d], RGB_2: [%d, %d, %d]",
00146                                                 //     error, rgb_first[0], rgb_first[1], rgb_first[2], rgb_second[0], rgb_second[1], rgb_second[2]);
00147                                                 seed_queue.push_back (nn_indices[j]);
00148                                                 processed[nn_indices[j]] = true;
00149                                         }
00150                                 }
00151                         }
00152 
00153                         //        ROS_INFO("Similar color found for : %d neighbors, out of %d popints", count, nn_indices.size());
00154                         sq_idx++;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 // If this queue is satisfactory, add to the clusters
00158                 if (seed_queue.size () >= minClusterSize && seed_queue.size () <= maxClusterSize)
00159                 {
00160 //                      std::cout << "[CHEAT][EuclideanClustering3D] found one cluster, size="<< seed_queue.size() << std::endl;
00161 
00162 //              std::cout << "ChekPOINT!! : " << inCloud->getSize() << std::endl;
00163 
00164                         seed_queue.erase(std::unique(seed_queue.begin(), seed_queue.end()),seed_queue.end());
00165 
00166 //              std::cout << "ChekPOINT!! : " << inCloud->getSize() << std::endl;
00167 
00168                         brics_3d::PointCloud3D *tempPointCloud =  new brics_3d::PointCloud3D();
00169 
00170                         for (size_t j = 0; j < seed_queue.size (); ++j) {
00171 
00172                                 brics_3d::ColoredPoint3D *tempPoint =  new brics_3d::ColoredPoint3D(
00173                                                 new brics_3d::Point3D(
00174                                                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].getX(),
00175                                                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].getY(),
00176                                                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].getZ()),
00177                                                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].asColoredPoint3D()->getR(),
00178                                                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].asColoredPoint3D()->getG(),
00179                                                                 (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[seed_queue[j]].asColoredPoint3D()->getB());
00180                                 tempPointCloud->addPointPtr(tempPoint);
00181 
00182                                 //                              delete tempPoint;
00183                         }
00184                         extractedClusters.push_back(tempPointCloud);
00185 //                      delete tempPointCloud; //?
00186                 }
00187 
00188         }
00189 
00190         //================================================================================================
00191 
00192 }
00193
